desc: Healing Balm & Natural Skincare using NZ native plants to aid in the healing of antibacterial, antiseptic, antifungal and anti inflammatory skin conditions. Helps psoriasis, eczema, infections, cold sores, arthritis, chafing, cracked heels, dermatitis, rashes, acne, insect bites, infections.

layout.text: TO HEAL AND NOURISH YOUR SKIN
